title: HCLTech completes acquisition of Paris based software firm Zeenea
description: This is the second acquisition that the company made in the first half of the current fiscal. Three months ago in May, the IT major announced its plans to acquire certain assets of Hewlett Packard Enterpriseâ€™s (HPE) Communications Technology Group (CTG) for $225 million (approximately Rs1,874 crore).
content: HCLTech late night Thursday said that it completed the acquisition of Paris based software company, Zeenea SAS. The acquisition valued Zeenea at $26.5 million (23.9 million euros), according to a BSE filing.
